      Hi, I'm Guowei Yan
      üìä üé∏ ‚òï üß† ‚ù§Ô∏è
      
        Business Analytics | Financial Analysis | Data Science
      

      
      Contact ‚úâÔ∏è

      
      
        I am a Business Analytics graduate student at Boston University. I love transforming raw data into actionable insights and creating data-driven solutions for real-world problems.
      
    

    
    
      
        
      
    
  


  Education
  
  
    Boston University
    Boston, MA
    
      Master of Science in Business Analytics
      Expected December 2025
    
    Key Courses: Data Mining for Business Analytics, Web Analytics for Business, Business Analytics Foundations, Quantitative and Qualitative Decision-Making, and Marketing Analytics
  
  
  
    Dongguan University of Technology
    Dongguan, Guangdong
    
      Industrial Engineering, Bachelor of Engineering
      Sept 2020 - July 2024
    
  


  Professional Experience
  
  
    Operations Analyst Intern
    Ruican Plastic Manufacturing, Dongguan, Guangdong
    
      Jan 2024 ‚Äì July 2024
    
    
      Collected and analyzed production and raw material usage data across manufacturing units.
      Created dashboards to visualize material waste and monthly output trends.
      Managed inventory and stock optimization for the warehouse.
      Prepared periodic cost-performance reports for workforce management.
    
  

  
    Investment Management Intern
    ZW Investment, Guangzhou, Guangdong
    
      Sept 2023 ‚Äì Nov 2023
    
    
      Assisted in preparing registration documents and compliance materials for private fund products.
      Compiled internal reports on fund performance and regulatory policy updates to support decision-making.
      Conducted weekly industry research and synthesized findings into team briefing materials.
      Prepared weekly portfolio summaries and forecasts.
    
  

  
    E-commerce Entrepreneur
    Individually-owned Business
    
      Jan 2022 ‚Äì July 2023
    
    Established and managed a Taobao-based studio, recruited employees, and maintained consistent profitability.
    
      Monitored product stock levels and tracked inventory turnover to ensure timely order fulfillment.
      Maintained and updated product listings, pricing, and visuals on the e-store.
      Performed market research on competitors, customer preferences, and product trends.
      Managed team operations, monitored performance, and provided training and support.
    
  


  Research Experience
  
    Case Study on Sustainable Supply Chain Management
    
      Research Project
      Feb 2023 ‚Äì Apr 2023
    
    
      Gained a fundamental understanding of supply relations and evaluated the advantages and disadvantages of various management methods.
      Conducted in-depth reviews and investigations through survey and model analysis methods across multiple case studies.
      Visualized industrial sales data utilizing charts and figures to assess the potential of China's car market and emphasize the necessity of sustainable supply chain management for Tesla's success.
      Formulated predictions and recommendations for the future development of the new energy vehicle industry.
      Co-authored a research paper focusing on a Tesla case study, handling the literature review and methodology components.
      Published Work: Presented findings in the paper ‚ÄúSustainable Supply Chain of New Energy Vehicles: A Case Study of Tesla‚Äù (Bai, Yan, & Yan, 2023), accepted by ICEMGD 2023 and indexed by CPCI and Google Scholar.
    
  


  Projects
  
  

    
      
        Business Running Case: Evaluating Personal Job Market Prospects in 2024
        Conducted a data-driven 2024 labor market trends analysis using Lightcast job postings. Utilized Python (pandas, Plotly) for data cleaning and visualization, and published results through Quarto and GitHub Pages.
        View Project
        
          Python
          Plotly
          GitHub Pages
          Quarto
        
      
    

    
      
        Predicting Consumer Disputes
        Developed a classification model (Naive Bayes and Decision Tree Classifiers) to detect whether consumers would dispute company responses based on historical complaint data.
        
          Python
          Naive Bayes
          Decision Tree
          Classification
        
      
    

    
      
        Cruise Industry Expansion Strategy
        Developed an interactive Tableau dashboard and performed Python-based exploratory data analysis to assess cruise market conditions and Caribbean port metrics for expansion opportunities. Conducted conjoint analysis and classification modeling to optimize voyage offerings and predict cancellation risk, complemented by A/B testing for marketing image effectiveness.
        
          Tableau
          EDA
          Python
          Conjoint Analysis
          A/B Testing
        
      
    

  


  Skills
  
  
    Computer Skills
    Microsoft Office, R, Python, Tableau, SQL, Spark
  


  Contact Me
  
  
    I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, data analytics projects, or just connecting with fellow data enthusiasts. Feel free to reach out to me through any of the following channels:
